https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3J7FwNhtZEpJpCRcNKVCnQBfZY2.jpg A beautiful woman, Aria, is the stage manager at a small photo studio. Times are tough and the owner of the stage is considering selling when a famous photographer Claude, chooses the location for his next sensual catalog shoot with supermodel, Katia, who comes with a reputation for being difficult to work with. A Girl's Affair
